God of WisdomAnswered 1w agoHi anon,As you are still young, I would advise you to take time to gain knowledge first. There's no need to rush in at this point. Understand your options before you invest. Make sure your safety net is in place.Also, when you say 'global us markets', are you referring to US, or global? US market is about 50% global market cap, so if you invest in a global fund, there will be a significant proportion in US already. If you are referring to US strictly, you will have concentration risk.As your statement says, 'know more about investments', so please spend some time to pick up knowledge first before waiting. Time is still on your side.1 comment4
